org.springframework.kafka.support

类 ProducerListenerAdapter<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.kafka.support.ProducerListenerAdapter<K,V>
  • 类型参数:
    K - the key type.
    V - the value type.
    所有已实现的接口:
    ProducerListener<K,V>
    直接已知子类:
    LoggingProducerListener

    public abstract class ProducerListenerAdapter<K,V>
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProducerListener<K,V>
    No-op implementation of ProducerListener, to be used as base class for other implementations.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onSuccess

        public void onSuccess(java.lang.String topic,
                      java.lang.Integer partition,
                      K key,
                      V value,
                      org.apache.kafka.clients.producer.RecordMetadata recordMetadata)
        从接口复制的说明: ProducerListener
        Invoked after the successful send of a message (that is, after it has been acknowledged by the broker).
        指定者:
        onSuccess 在接口中 ProducerListener<K,V>
        参数:
        topic - the destination topic
        partition - the destination partition (could be null)
        key - the key of the outbound message
        value - the payload of the outbound message
        recordMetadata - the result of the successful send operation

      • onError

        public void onError(java.lang.String topic,
                    java.lang.Integer partition,
                    K key,
                    V value,
                    java.lang.Exception exception)
        从接口复制的说明: ProducerListener
        Invoked after an attempt to send a message has failed.
        指定者:
        onError 在接口中 ProducerListener<K,V>
        参数:
        topic - the destination topic
        partition - the destination partition (could be null)
        key - the key of the outbound message
        value - the payload of the outbound message
        exception - the exception thrown

      • isInterestedInSuccess

        public boolean isInterestedInSuccess()
        从接口复制的说明: ProducerListener
        Return true if this listener is interested in success as well as failure.
        指定者:
        isInterestedInSuccess 在接口中 ProducerListener<K,V>
        返回:
        true to express interest in successful sends.
